name: Cut Zombies
description:
★★★★★ Cut Zombies★★★★★

Zombies are coming. Cut them using your blade, and save the missing girl.

"Cut Zombies" is incredibly simple and highly addictive!

"Cut Zombies" features hours of gameplay, challenging, and lots of replay value.

We’d like to take this opportunity to extend our infinite gratitude to friends of our "Cut Zombies" everywhere. We thank you sincerely from the bottoms of our fluffy hearts for making "Cut Zombies" the highest rated and best selling game ever on iTunes!

Combining outstanding gameplay, amazingly responsive controls and beautiful graphics, "Cut Zombies" will be one of the most fun and original games on the App Store.

With loads of exciting and devilishly tricky gameplay, "Cut Zombies" guarantees you many hours of fun.

★★★★★ ADDICTIVE FEATURES ★★★★★

• AMAZING GAMEPLAY
- Gorgeous interface style
- Fun game set
- Simple but skillfull arcade game
- Simple and familiar gameplay you know and love
- Experience great pleasure in revenge
- Fun for the whole family to play game

• SPEED AND SPEED UP MODES FOR DOUBLE THE FUN
At the next, next wave, more speed and more clever for game

• Access your games across your iPhone, and/or iPod touch

• Remember, positive reviews keep the updates coming!
